Title: Allow player to move horizontally and vertically
Description: Enable basic movement of the player using arrow keys.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Block movement through walls
Description: Prevent the player from moving through walls.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Push boxes if next tile is free or a goal
Description: Implement pushing logic respecting Sokoban rules.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Validate tile content constraints
Description: Ensure that each tile contains at most one element (box, goal, wall, player). This validation applies when loading the board and during gameplay.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Detect when all boxes are on goal positions
Description: Check level completion when all goals are filled.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Read level1.txt in specified format
Description: Parse and build the level from the text file format.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Count number of movements made by the player
Description: Display move counter on screen.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Show congratulations message at level completion
Description: Show a message when the level is completed.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Create basic GUI window using Java Swing
Description: Create the main window and layout for the game.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Handle keyboard input
Description: Capture and process arrow key input.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Initial team planning meeting
Description: Summary of initial team planning and task assignment.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Improve visual appearance of game elements
Description: Ensure that all game elements (walls, boxes, goals, player) have a clear, consistent, and distinguishable visual style. Boxes on goals should change appearance.
Author: MARTIN RODRIGUEZ, DANIEL

Title: Merge Consecutive Walls Visually
Description: Implement visual merging of two or more consecutive wall tiles so they appear as a single wall.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Track Level Score Based on Moves
Description: Track and store the number of moves made by the player in each level as the level score.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Track Total Game Score
Description: Calculate and display the total score across all completed levels.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Change Box Color on Goal
Description: Boxes placed on goal positions must change color to indicate correct placement.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Add Level 2 and Level 3
Description: Create at least two additional level files (level2.txt and level3.txt) with different board layouts.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Skip Invalid Level Automatically
Description: If a level is invalid, show an error and try to load the next available level automatically.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Display Final Victory Message with Score
Description: Show a congratulations message and total score after completing the last level.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Display Level Name and Scores in GUI
Description: Show the level name, current level score, and total game score in the GUI.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Fix Save Game Functionality
Description: Ensure the save feature stores the full game state, including level, moves, and scores.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Fix Load Game Functionality
Description: Ensure the load feature restores the full game state and updates the interface accordingly.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Implement the Undo button
Description: Implement the Undo button to allow the player undo the last movement.
Author: GARCÍA-CARO BARTOLOMÉ, ÁLVARO

Title: Add sound effects
Description: The actions should have sounds. When the player moves, pushes a box, complete a goal tile and complvte the label should trigger a simple and different sound effect each.
Author: MARTIN RODRIGUEZ, DANIEL

Title: Add music
Description: The game could have an audio in loop while playing.
Author: MARTIN RODRIGUEZ, DANIEL

Title: Add more levels
Description: Add levels beyond those strictly necessary, increasing complexity
Author: MARTIN RODRIGUEZ, DANIEL
